    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16975094">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975094">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975094">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975094">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975094" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975095">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975095">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975095">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975095">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975095" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975096">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975096">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975096">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           If I want to publish my class project on the web, where can I find images, etc. that I can use without asking for permission?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975096">
          <p>
           Consult...
           <br />
           Trexler Library's guide to
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/publicdomain">
            <em>
             Nonexclusively Licensed and Public Domain Images
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975096" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16975097">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975097">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975097">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for getting recommendations of sources, including primary sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975097">
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           generally. . .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <em>
            Britain in the Hanoverian Age
           </em>
           (Ref Collection
           <a href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search%7ES0?/c942.07+N552b/c942.07+n552b/-3,-1,,E/browse">
            942.07 N552b
           </a>
           )
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           dance and music . . .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <em>
            International Encyclopedia of Dance
           </em>
           (Ref Collection
           <a href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search%7ES0?/c792.6203+I61e/c792.6203+i61e/-3,-1,,E/browse">
            792.6203 I61e
           </a>
           )
           <br />
           <em>
            New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
           </em>
           &nbsp;(Ref Collection &nbsp;
           <a href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search%7ES0?/c780.3+N532n/c780.3+n532n/-3,-1,,E/browse">
            780.3 N532n
           </a>
           )
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           art/architecture. . .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/">
            <em>
             Oxford Art Online
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           A library subscription database.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975097" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975098">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975098">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975098">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary and secondary works as published in books and periodicals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975098">
          <div id="boxatt16975098" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20017643">
              <a id="link_20017643" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20017643,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14124791}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A combination of partial and complete texts. Especially rich source for public domain works (pre-1923).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20017704">
              <a id="link_20017704" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20017704,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of all books and documents in Trexler Library at Muhlenberg College, plus books from other libraries that can be requested on interlibrary loan. Alternatively, use our own library catalog (just the books in our library)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975099">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975099">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975099">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Secondary research published as journal articles--often authoritative
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975099">
          <div id="boxatt16975099" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20017644">
              <a id="link_20017644" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20017644,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Focus on European History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20017647">
              <a id="link_20017647" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20017647,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24778958">
              <a id="link_24778958" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24778958,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20480430">
              <a id="link_20480430" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20480430,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Standard index for literary criticism. Some links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975100">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975100">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975100">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Web search engines and directories
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975100">
          <div id="boxatt16975100" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20017649">
              <a id="link_20017649" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20017649,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975598">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975598">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975598">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected sites that may provide links to artifacts
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975598">
          <div id="boxatt16975598" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20018900">
              <a id="link_20018900" href="http://www.themorgan.org/collections/works/repton/default.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018900,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018900}); ">
               Humphrey Repton's Red Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20018905">
              <a id="link_20018905" href="http://www.songsmyth.com/costumerscompanion.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018905,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018905}); ">
               Jessamyn's Regency Costume Companion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20018915">
              <a id="link_20018915" href="http://www.janeausten.co.uk/online-magazine/regency-recipes/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018915,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018915}); ">
               Regency Recipes
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20018921">
              <a id="link_20018921" href="http://www.pemberley.com/janeinfo/rgnclfil.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018921,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018921}); ">
               Regency Illustrations
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20018926">
              <a id="link_20018926" href="http://pemberley.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018926,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018926}); ">
               Republic of Pemberley Links
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975672">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975672">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975672">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           E-texts of Austen's work
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975672">
          <div id="boxatt16975672" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20018957">
              <a id="link_20018957" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018957,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20017618}); ">
               Project Gutenberg
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20018969">
              <a id="link_20018969" href="http://pemberley.com/?page_id=6424" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20018969,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20018969}); ">
               Republic of Pemberley
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index puts search terms in context.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21281471">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21281471">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21281471">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Newspapers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21281471">
          <div id="boxatt21281471" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24788027">
              <a id="link_24788027" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24788027,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Reading Austen', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344567}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4616588" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16975101">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975101">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975101">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975101">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources.
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero.
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975101" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16975102">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16975102">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16975102">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16975102">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16975102" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
